overview: Markâ€™s start-up experience is vast. His start-ups include A3 Technologies, Ann Arbor, MI and PrepaidSolutions.co.uk, a wholly owned subsidiary based in London, England. Mark designed, created and launched the world’s first PartyPoker.com pre-paid gift card. Prior to A3 Technologies, he resurrected Internetmoney.com and co-founded IMX-Solutions.com. Mark was the primary inventor of a Patent that enables Secure Monetary Transactions Across the Internet with IMX-Solutions.com. Mark earned his nickname, MarkDotCom when he launched Mortgageonline@msn.com, the first site to provide mortgages online through Microsoft in 1994. In addition, Mark is also the primary inventor for Kidscash.com, a safe, convenient way for kids to shop online without credit cards. Mark is the primary inventor for URturn having discovered a method to award Points to Users from third party sites. Mark holds a B.A. in Economics from the University of Michigan and attended the Rack ham Graduate School of Applied Economics. Mark is a Macroeconomist by education and is the primary author on the Intellectual Property as well as other patents.
